titleInfo.title: 1847 Mar. 11 [to] Mrs. William R. Caswell, Russelville, Tenn.

subject.topic: Caswell, William Richard; Caswell, Mrs. William R.

mods.note: This document is a letter written by William Richard Caswell, March 11th, 1847, to his wife while on board the "St. Patrick" during the Mexican-American War. Caswell was part of the many "volunteers" from Tennessee to fight in the war.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
